comment._content: I'm a history teacher in Brazil and I used the pictures in my Ancient Egypt classes. All the students loved them!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Thanks so much for dropping us a line! -sb

comment.author: 27398485@N08
comment._content: Third Dynasty 2649-2575 BC -  Step mastaba Pyramid of Pharaoh Djoser  in background - AKA Djozer, Zoser -  reputed to be the design of physician architect Imhotep, who was revered (with his own temples) for nearly 1,000 yrs, as the God Protector of architects and physicians.  Discovery that honey held infections away, and other medical advances also attributed to Imhotep.

comment.author: 25752562@N07
comment._content: In the foreground is the pyramid of Userkaf.
